articles.title: Amid Covid-19 pandemic, South-east Asia's drug scourge proves resilient - The Straits Times
articles.description: The region's US$61.4 billion (S$82.7 billion) narcotics trade is in full swing.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
JAKARTA - In a series of raids, as the Covid-19 pandemic was closing in last year, Myanmar security forces in northern Shan state netted 18 tonnes of methamphetamine - a record for Asia.
